abstract: The move comes after the Transport and General Workers’ Union failed to reach an agreement over sick leave, pay and staffing.
snippet: The move comes after the Transport and General Workers’ Union failed to reach an agreement over sick leave, pay and staffing.
lead_paragraph: British Airways cabin crews plan a three-day strike starting Jan. 29, after the Transport and General Workers’ Union failed to reach an agreement over sick leave, pay and staffing.

headline.main: BA Cabin Crews Plan Brief Strike
headline.print_headline: BA Cabin Crews Plan Brief Strike
